Soul Reaver.name: Soul Reaver
Soul Reaver.flavor: Your shadowblade bites deeply into your foe, cutting through flesh, soul, and shadow.
Soul Reaver.attack: Dexterity vs. AC, or Dexterity vs. Reflex if you make this attack with your shadowblade.
Soul Reaver.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you gain a gloom shard.

Shadow Curse.name: Shadow Curse
Shadow Curse.flavor: You utter a dark curse upon your foe as you strike it. At your bidding, the shadows you have carved from your enemies leap on that foe like rabid dogs.
Shadow Curse.attack: Dexterity vs. AC, or Dexterity vs. Reflex if you make this attack with your shadowblade.
Shadow Curse.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can expend a gloom shard once per turn as a minor action to deal 5 + your Dexterity modifier necrotic damage to the target and gain combat advantage against it until the end of your turn.

Veil of Unsight.name: Veil of Unsight
Veil of Unsight.flavor: Shadows swirl around you, making you or an ally impossible to see.
Veil of Unsight.effect: The target becomes invisible until the end of your next turn.
